DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to investigate the role of gait disturbance as a cause for difference in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) between both hips. Each subject will undergo the following tests: Functional Mobility Testing, Gait analysis, Motion Analysis, Assessments for Balance and Gait and Cognitive assessments.
DOC.brief_title: Gait Disturbances and Hips Bone Mineral Density
DOC.criteria: 1. differeneces in hips in Bone Mineral Density test in one group. 2. Age 4080. 1. bone disease, 2. arthritis, 3. congenital skeletal malformations, 4. pregnancy, 5. neurological disease
